public class ShopActivity extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
The ShopActivity class represents the main activity for the shopping functionality in the Android application. Users can buy and select colors for their points.

      protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)

      private void setButtonClickListener(android.widget.Button button, int cost, String color)
      Sets the click listener for the specified button, allowing users to buy a color.
      Parameters:
      button - The button to set the click listener for.
      cost - The cost associated with buying the color.
      color - The color being purchased.

    • checkPoints

      public boolean checkPoints(int neededPts)
      Checks whether the user has enough points to make a purchase.
      Parameters:
      neededPts - The points required for the purchase.
      Returns:
      true if the user has enough points,false otherwise.
